title: Has the DRC robot urdf model, bumper or contact Sensors?

content.raw:
Hello
I would like to know the answer for the next 3 questions:
1. has the Drcrobot  urdfmodel pressure, bumper, force or contact sensors?
2. Has the Drcrobot  urdfmodel  pressure, bumper, force or contact sensors in the foot?

3. what is the line,in the urdf model ,where i can see those sensors?

pd: I have attached the urdf model to this message.
